items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Fantastic Sweater
items.body: I am pleasantly surprised by the quality of this sweater. It’s not too heavy but not too light. Most sweaters often swallow me up or are too short. It’s warm, soft, comfortable, and it fits perfectly. I will definitely order more colors. This will be a fall/winter staple for me. It’s fitted but not tight and works well under layers. I washed & dried it before wearing it and I found that it did pill or come apart. I am very happy with the Amazon Essentials brand. Read more
items.author: SH

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect sweater
items.body: This is such a great sweater! It’s a nice weight, not thick or bulky at all. I was worried about what a $20 sweater would feel like, but I was pleasantly surprised. Based on the other reviews I did size up. I am 5’7 and wear a size 14, I normally order XL but went with a XXL and glad I did. It lays nicely, not boxy, the sleeves are long enough and I can tuck it slightly in to my waistband and still hangs beautifully. I’ve not laundered it yet but will be hanging to dry (as I do with all my sweaters). I will absolutely be ordering more. Read more
items.author: Missy

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Nice cotton sweater
items.body: Very happy with this 100% cotton sweater. I’m trying to avoid synthetic material when possible, which is becoming increasingly difficult. This sweater seems well made and is very comfortable. It might run a little small, or I might be packing a couple of ice-cream-summer pounds ! ;-). The sleeves were to long for my petite self, but the cuffs turned up for a perfect fit Read more
items.author: Kindle Customer

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very Nice Sweater & 100% Cotton ! Recommend
items.body: Very Nice Sweater as described & so glad it is 100% Cotton, Ordered a Small & I usually wear a Medium & would say it fits lie a S/M - plenty of length as on the model in the ad but slightly snug in the arms & shoulders, I am 5 ft 6 inch & 128 lbs, Might order another one in Medium, Read more
items.author: BolBol

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Terrible quality and sizing
items.body: Beautiful and great fitting sweaters, but unfortunately not great quality and sizing is way off. I bought two of these in off white and green color. After several purchases and returns to find the right size, I ended up keeping both colors and both XL size (I wear medium size in general) However, green (dark color) did not hold up well with washing. After only one wash, the sweater looked really faded and worn out. It didn't shrink or change otherwise, but it looked really old and worn out. The off white one looked much better as fading didn't affect it. I loved that these are cotton sweaters and they were super comfortable and soft initially. They are classic fit and cut and I loved everything about them. However I'm disappointed I was able to wear them only few times because of the quality issues. Read more
items.author: ClassySassy

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice wardrobe basic
items.body: This sweater is a really good basic for my wardrobe. I like a V-neck but many are too low for cooler weather. This one is not. I don't feel like I have to layer a tee under it at all...though it's great for layering too if you want. The color is rich and the quality seems good. I can't speak to how well it holds up in the wash...will update if that becomes an issue. Read more
items.author: Lori

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Definitely buying more colors!
items.body: I received this sweater (burgundy color) a couple days ago and while outside it’s still pretty warm, my office is FREEZING. So I'm wearing it today. This sweater is thicker than I expected but it’s not bulky. The quality also feels really nice - doesn't feel like it’s going to pill up after a couple of wearings like a lot of synthetic fabrics do. I'm 5'10" with a long torso so shirt lengths can sometimes be an issue for me. This hits just about mid-hip on me which is prefect. I ordered the XXL (220lbs here) and it fits perfectly. Many reviewers mention that its boxy – I guess I have a bit of a boxy shape because I don’t really notice that. I didn’t want something super form fitting and this definitely has room to layer a tee or blouse underneath. I am a sucker for a v-neck, whether it be a tee shirt or sweater. I will absolutely be ordering more colors. Read more
items.author: TL Quinn

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars All cotton! Tightly knit
items.body: I ordered the peach color. It’s very pretty but it’s brighter than the photo-it more like the color of cantaloupe. Amazon Essentials are always good basics but not totally consistent in sizes across the label. This one is just a little bit smaller than some, but close in size. I dried it in the dryer on low heat and it shrunk slightly, but I bought a larger size intending to dry it. I’m very pleased with this simple basic sweater. It seems well made like it will wear well. Read more
items.author: a reader

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

The design is easy to style with simple accessories and works well in photos thanks to clean lines and a balanced silhouette.

The design is easy to style with simple accessories and works well in photos thanks to clean lines and a balanced silhouette.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: One Size.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Olive, Ecru, Navy, White, Lime Green, Burgundy, Peach, Black, Light Pink. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
